DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare effect 6 week endurance strength train wait list comparison condition symptom Generalized Anxiety Disorder ( GAD ) .
DOC.brief_title: Exercise Training Treatment Generalized Anxiety Disorder
DOC.criteria: Women age 1839 year Principal diagnosis Generalized Anxiety Disorder accord DSMIV diagnostic criterion ( comorbidities acceptable long Generalized Anxiety Disorder principal diagnosis ) A score less 45 Penn State Worry Questionnaire A score le 7 Generalized Anxiety Disorder section Psychiatric Diagnostic Screening Questionnaire Expending great 250 kilocalorie per kilogram body weight per week measure 7day physical activity recall questionnaire Engaging great 6 exercise bout month prior recruitment Pregnancy Any medical contraindication ( cardiovascular musculoskeletal ) exercise train accord American College Sports Medicine guideline
